creator: joerg@dorchain.net
text:
With similar reasoning as bugs #37619, I would consider a RedirectMatchExcept an
improvement for redirecting all but certain URLs

This is already possible with

RewriteCond %{REQUEST_URI} !/exceptthisurl
RewriteRule .* http://somewhere.org/someplace [R,L]
creator: rpluem@apache.org

text:
As with bug 37619, negative lookahead regex's works as well and look nicer to me
than mod_rewrite.

Adding a word in the docs about the "all but one" match would make it more
obvious than this bug report, in case the question arrives more often.

Thanks for the support.
creator: joerg@dorchain.net
